## Matrix.ComposeToRef() method

Sets a matrix to a value composed by merging scale (vector3), rotation (quaternion) and translation (vector3)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static ComposeToRef(scale: Vector3, rotation: Quaternion, translation: Vector3, result: Matrix): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scale | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the scale vector3 |
|  rotation | <code>Quaternion</code> | defines the rotation quaternion |
|  translation | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the translation vector3 |
|  result | <code>Matrix</code> | defines the target matrix |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
